title: Account transfers half off for a limited time

replies.body:
Still trying to transfer my account back to EUW. My acc has been stranded in OCE for 8 months now, when the heck will I finally be able to transfer ?
The level of incompetence and lack of communication RIOT displayed on that matter is unacceptable for such a  big company

Account transfers were restored back when that post was made (Feb 7th). Transfers do become unavailable every patch until relevant regions are on the same patch (have to be on the same patch to transfer) but that is usually a matter of a day. As to why they are unavailable now I'm not sure, and I'll see if I can find out. It sounds like you have some pretty unlucky timing that's for sure.

Have you tried submitting a ticket to player support about transferring recently?

Yes, talk about bad timing.
I opened a ticket in late January and I was told they "couldn't provide [me] with more information this time".
I gave up, frustrated to have been waiting since October to transfer my account unsuccessfully. 
I gave it a go again on May 20th, apparently 3 days after they disabled the transfers... I opened another ticket and was told the transfers would be made available again on June the 2nd. Still waiting...

So I knew I remembered reading something recently and it was in the client notifications. There is planned maintenance from the 17th of May to the 15th of June. I don't recall that end date changing but it's possible it could have if things were taking longer than expected. It sounds like you've been rather unlucky with the issues in January and the maintenance now, but hopefully it'll only be a few more days.
